name: SaaS Founder
desc: Jesel built our helpdesk from the ground up and documented workflows that cut first response time by 40%. CSAT improved noticeably within a quarter.

name: E‑commerce Owner
desc: He streamlined our Shopify + Gorgias stack and set up macros and automations that saved hours weekly. Customer retention is up and tickets are cleaner.

name: Property Manager
desc: With clear SOPs in AppFolio/Buildium and better team structure, our unit turnover got faster and resident communication improved across the board.

name: Customer Success Lead
desc: Jesel is proactive, data‑driven, and calm under pressure. He owns problems end‑to‑end and ships pragmatic solutions that stick.
